column2: CHANGES TO PRIVACY STATEMENT   If we decide to change our Privacy Statement for the Science websites, we will post those changes here so that you will always know what information we gather, how we might use that information, and to whom we will disclose it. If at any time, you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Statement, please feel free to e-mail us at membership{at}aaas.org or call us at +1 202-326-6417 and speak to one of our representatives.
